name: Infinite Zombie
description:
This is not a joke !?
Stop the scary zombies and rescue boys and girls!

Now, wait ...
So why is the hostage running from behind? haha

◆ Let's achieve the best score and combo!
◆ Let's achieve 35 achievements!
◆ Let's collect all the cannons!

Best free game to be bored at all times!
Popular personal broadcasting creators!
Broadcasting please :)
